title: Neutrogena Clean Conditioner, Replenishing , 10.1 Fluid Ounce
description: <P>Moisturizing Conditioner</P> <P><STRONG>Replenishes Moisture to Improve Hair and Add Shine   Rinsese Clean Without Build-Up</STRONG></P> <P><STRONG>Neutrogena Clean Replenishing™ Conditioner </STRONG>hydrates and conditions to improve dry, damaged hair, without leaving heavy build-up.  This moisture-enriched formula softens hair while it penetrates dry, damaged strands to strengthen and make hair more resilient.  It rinses clean and won't weigh hair down, so it's great for everyday use.  This lightweight formula, with its fresh, clean scent, leaves hair shiny, silky and healthy-looking.</P>

title: Vagisil Deodorant Powder Talc-Free, 8 Ounce
